Package com.islandpower.configurator.dto

Class SummaryDto

java.lang.Object
com.islandpower.configurator.dto.SummaryDto
public class SummaryDto extends Object
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for summarizing project configurations. This DTO aggregates project-related data, including the project itself, and its associated inverter, battery, solar panel, and controller.
